title: How to fix the scroll on a laptop's touchpad - Quora

response.answer_text: Check the settings of your touchpad in related software you can find this easily in control panel.Check if driver is installed perfectly by troubleshooting. You can troubleshoot in device manager.Roll back to previous version. It works if you updated your drivers and then it stops working.Update your driver or download and install latest driver.

what is it doing or not doing. Could be a setting within control panel, a conficting device or you may need a new touch pad. Sewn it back to your manufacturer and let them diagnose it for you so you don't spend time on somethign it isn't. www,m-techlaptops.com
